duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in providing direct patient care as delegated by the Registered Nurse within the scope of the CNA licensure.

Perform basic technical skills including CPR, vital signs recording, fluid intake/output measurement, applying dressings, recognizing signs and symptoms of common diseases, and administering treatments as directed.
Assist patients with personal care including bathing, mouth and skin care, grooming, dressing, toileting assistance, eating, and hydration.
Provide patients with assistance in walking, exercising, and moving in and out of bed.
Maintain unit supplies by stocking patient rooms and supply areas to meet patient care needs.
Document relevant patient care data and provide clerical support to the unit.
May perform other duties as assigned such as order entry, chart processing, and answering telephones.

education_certification.credential: Graduate of an approved Certified Nursing Assistant program required.
